Class Officer

java.lang.Object
Officer.Officer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IUserProfile
public class Officer extends Object implements IEntity, IUserProfile
Represents an HDB Officer in the system. Implements both IEntity and IUserProfile for persistence and profile handling. Encapsulates officer details such as name, NRIC, age, marital status, and user credentials.
